import React, {useState} from 'react'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import APIService from "./components/APIService"; export default function (props) { let [authMode, setAuthMode] = useState("signin") let [name, setName] = useState('') let [username, setUsername] = useState('') let [email, setEmail] = useState('') let [password, setPassword] = useState('') let [UserOrEmail, setUserOrEmail] = useState('') const insertUser = () => { APIService.InsertUser({name, username, email, password}) .then((response) => props.insertedUser(response)) .catch(error => console.log('Error while creating user', username)) } const getUser = () => { APIService.getUser(username, {name, username, email, password}) .then((response) => props.obtainedUser(response)) .catch(error => console.log('Error while creating user', username)) } function isValidEmail(email) { return /\S+@\S+\.\S+/.test(email); } function checkUserOrEmail(email){ if (UserOrEmail.includes('@')) { if (isValidEmail(email)) { setEmail() } } } const handleSignUp = (event) => { event.preventDefault() insertUser() setName('') setUsername('') setEmail('') setPassword('') } const handleSignIn = (event) => { event.preventDefault() insertUser() setName('') setUsername('') setEmail('') setPassword('') } const changeAuthMode = () => { setAuthMode(authMode === "signin" ? "signup" : "signin") } if (authMode === "signin") { return (

Sign In

setUserOrEmail(e.target.value)} required />
setPassword(e.target.value)} required />

) } return (

) }
